Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:08.27]Fire and ice
[00:09.64]This love is like fire and ice
[00:11.28]This love is like rain and blue skies
[00:13.21]This love is like sun on the rise
[00:15.00]This love got me rolling the dice
[00:17.54]Don't let me lose
[00:19.22]Still falling for you
[00:20.95]Still falling for you
[00:21.96]
[00:24.19]Beautiful mind
[00:25.29]Your heart got a story with mine
[00:27.22]Your heart got me hurting at times
[00:29.15]Your heart gave me new kind of highs
[00:31.03]Your heart got me feeling so fine
[00:33.29]So what to do
[00:35.37]Still falling for you
[00:36.99]Still falling for you
[00:38.00]
[00:39.27]It took us a while
[00:41.43]With every breath a new day
[00:43.89]With love on the line
[00:45.06]We've had our share of mistakes
[00:47.84]But all your flaws and scars are mine
[00:51.24]Still falling for you
[00:52.87]Still falling for you
[00:53.93]
[00:55.62]And just like that
[00:58.67]All I breathe
[00:59.08]All I feel
[01:00.80]You are all for me
[01:02.57]I'm in
[01:03.64]And just like that
[01:04.97]All I breathe
[01:06.80]All I feel
[01:08.53]You are all for me
[01:10.62]And just like that
[01:19.66]And just like that
[01:21.43]
[01:44.27]Brighter than gold
[01:45.38]This love shining brighter than gold
[01:47.27]This love is like letters in bold
[01:49.15]This love is like out of control
[01:51.42]This love is never growing old
[01:53.70]You make it new
[01:55.43]Still falling for you
[01:57.10]Still falling for you
[01:59.50]
[02:00.01]It took us a while
[02:01.22]Because we were young and unsure
[02:03.88]With love on the line
[02:05.10]What if we both would need more
[02:07.58]But all your flaws and scars are mine
[02:11.35]Still falling for you
[02:12.82]Still falling for you
[02:13.47]Still falling for you
[02:14.09]
[02:15.50]And just like that
[02:25.04]All I breathe
[02:26.86]All I feel
[02:28.33]You are all for me
[02:30.73]I'm in
[02:31.64]And just like that
[02:47.61]And just like that
[03:03.63]And just like that
